result.description: The ultimate experiment assembled and performedMoreover two further experimental options that have come up during the running of the TEQ project will be will be explored and the results will be reported in D33The first option is using Meissner levitation of a ferromagnet of diameter less than 10 m in the Southampton lownoise environment Preliminary tests have been done and are promising to lead to an improved test of the CSL noise The second option is to use the much smaller molecules in the Paul trap at Aarhus which can be controlled to a much higher degree in their motional and energy states by optical techniques perfected in the group This new option has to be evaluated by theory on their ability to perform strong tests of CSL
